Class PackingModel

java.lang.Object
ci553.ministore.clients.staffjavafx.packing.PackingModel
public class PackingModel extends Object
Model class for the packing interface. Handles business logic and updates the view through properties.

  • Property Summary

    Description

  • Constructor Details

    • PackingModel

      public PackingModel(MiddleFactory mlf)
      Constructor for PackingModel. Initializes the model with the provided MiddleFactory and starts a background thread to check for new orders.
      Parameters:
      mlf - The MiddleFactory instance.

  • Method Details

    • doPack

      public void doPack()
      Marks the current order as packed. Updates the message and reply properties accordingly.

    • cleanup

      public void cleanup()
      Cleans up resources and stops the background thread. Prevents resource leaks by interrupting the thread.

    • messageProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty messageProperty()
      Gets the message property for binding.

      The message property.

      Returns:
      The reply property.
